title: Export Filtered Dataset from Power BI to SQL Server Programmatically using API and Power BI Embedded
excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can export the filtered data from Power BI report and insert the data back to the SQL Server.  Power BI Service donâ€™t provide such customization. However, we can manage this thing with the help of the Power BI Embedded concept. First we need to embed the Power BI report.
